com.codepoetics.fluvius.flows

Class Flows

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codepoetics.fluvius.flows.Flows

  • public final class Flows
extends Object
    Provides the public API for constructing flows.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  Flows.SuccessCapture<V>
      The second stage of a fluent API for defining branching Flows that respond to success/failure of the previous flow.

public static <T> T run(Flow<T> flow,
                                    FlowVisitor<Action> flowVisitor,
                                    Scratchpad initialScratchpad)
                             throws Exception
        Deprecated. 
        Run the supplied Flow, using the given FlowVisitor to construct an execution plan, providing it with the given initial Scratchpad.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the Flow result.
        Parameters:
        flow - The Flow to run.
        flowVisitor - The FlowVisitor to use to construct an execution plan.
        initialScratchpad - The Scratchpad to start with.
        Returns:

                                    FlowVisitor<Action> flowVisitor,
                                    KeyValue... keyValues)

        Deprecated. 
        Run the supplied Flow, using the given FlowVisitor to construct an execution plan, providing it with an initial Scratchpad containing the given key values.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the Flow result.
        Parameters:
        flow - The Flow to run.
        flowVisitor - The FlowVisitor to use to construct an execution plan.

        The result of running the Flow.

      • branch

        public static <T> BranchBuilder<T> branch(Condition condition,
                                          Flow<T> ifTrue)
        Start defining a branching flow, beginning with the supplied Condition and Flow to execute if the condition is met.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the value returned by the Flow.
        Parameters:
        condition - The first Condition in the branching flow.
        ifTrue - The Flow to execute if the condition is met.
        Returns:
        The next stage of the Fluent API.

      • onSuccess

        public static <V> Flows.SuccessCapture<V> onSuccess(Key<?> key,
                                                    Flow<V> successFlow)
        Construct a branching Flow that responds to the success or failure of a previous flow.
        Parameters:
        key - The key to which the result of the previous flow will have been written.
        Returns:
        The next stage in the fluent API that constructs the branching Flow.

      • recoverFrom

        public static FailureKeyCapture recoverFrom(Key<?> failureKey)
        Construct a Flow that recovers from an exception returned by a previous flow.
        Parameters:
        failureKey - The key against which the failure reason was recorded.
        Returns:
        The next state in the fluent API that constructs the recovery Flow.
